item.title: Leetcode
item.description: 中心思想 由简单到复杂 (不先考虑边界问题) 由局部到整体 由粗糙到精细 由厚到薄 买卖股票简答: class Solution: def maxProfit(self, prices): """ :type prices: List[int] :rtype: int """ min_p, max_p = 999999, 0 for i in range(len(prices)): min_p = min(min_p, prices[i]) max_p =
